activities.title: Two Truths and a Lie
activities.summary: Participants take turns sharing two true statements and one false one about themselves, while others guess which is the lie.
activities.objectives: Foster communication, creativity, and quick thinking
activities.instructions: 1. Explain the rules of Two Truths and a Lie. 2. Give participants time or materials if needed. 3. Engage in the activity. 4. Wrap up with reflections or highlights.

activities.title: Would You Rather
activities.summary: A quick decision-making game where participants choose between two challenging or amusing options and explain their choice.
activities.objectives: Foster communication, creativity, and quick thinking
activities.instructions: 1. Explain the rules of Would You Rather. 2. Give participants time or materials if needed. 3. Engage in the activity. 4. Wrap up with reflections or highlights.

activities.title: Draw Your Mood
